alert.note: Alert for Bienville; Claiborne; Jackson; Lincoln; Ouachita; Union (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 14 at 2:40AM CDT until June 14 at 3:45AM CDT by NWS Shreveport
info.description: The National Weather Service in Shreveport has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northern Jackson Parish in north central Louisiana... Union Parish in north central Louisiana... Ouachita Parish in north central Louisiana... Central Claiborne Parish in northwestern Louisiana... Northeastern Bienville Parish in northwestern Louisiana... Lincoln Parish in north central Louisiana... * Until 345 AM CDT. * At 240 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Cooley to 7 miles southwest of Bernice to near Homer, moving southeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Monroe, Ruston, Claiborne, West Monroe, Grambling, Homer, Swartz, Brownsville-Bawcom, Brownsville-Bawcomville, Farmerville, Richwood, Arcadia, Bernice, Sterlington, Cooley, Dubach, Choudrant, Simsboro, Junction City and Chatham. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Large hail and damaging winds and continuous cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Move indoors immediately. Lightning is one of nature`s leading killers. Remember, if you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning.

area.areaDesc: Bienville; Claiborne; Jackson; Lincoln; Ouachita; Union
